Pater noster: Advéniat regnum tuum; fiat vóluntas tua
qui es in caelis: sicut in caelo et in terra. ^ Thy kingdom come; thy will be done on earth as it is in heaven.

Pater noster: Panem nostrum supersubstantiálem da nobis hódie
qui es in caelis: ^ Give us this day our supersubstantial bread
sicut et nos dimíttimus debitóribus nostris
who art in heaven: as we also forgive our debtors

Pater noster: et ne nos indúcas in tentátionem
qui es in caelis: sed líbera nos a Malo. Amen. ^ and lead us not into temptation
sanctificétur nomen tuum. ^ Our Father: but deliver us from the Evil One. Amen.
